_item_identifier_id.description: Internal identifier used to link the item data with other related information.

ItemIdentifier.description: The unique identifier assigned to each item in the stock.

Qualifier.description: Additional information or criteria related to the stock summary data.

TotalReceived.description: The total quantity of items received in the stock since inception or a specific period.

Allocated.description: The quantity of items that have been assigned or promised to a specific purpose or order.

Available.description: The quantity of items that are currently in stock and can be sold or used.

OnHold.description: The quantity of items that are currently reserved for a specific purpose or order but not yet allocated.

OnHand.description: The total quantity of items physically present in the stock.

FacilityId.description: The unique identifier of the facility where the items are stored.
